data.text: RÃ©my Nicolas Lucien Belvaux was a Belgian actor, director, producer and screenwriter. He was the brother of Lucas Belvaux, also an actor and film director, and of Bruno Belvaux, a theater director. In 1992, he was with AndrÃ© Bonzel and BenoÃ®t Poelvoorde, director, producer and actor of the feature film Man Bites Dog. This film, which was his most famous movie, and originally titled "C'est arrivÃ© prÃ¨s de chez vous", is about a camera crew filming a documentary about the life of a serial killer.
